method_signatures: applyEnemyDamage(amount: number, hasShields: boolean, difficulty: DifficultyLevel)

gotchas_discovered: Need to handle edge case of no undamaged systems
Potential floating point precision issues with damage calculation
Complexity in damage calculation based on multiple factors

key_features: 10% chance of system damage on higher difficulties
Returns object with energy lost and system damaged

recommendations: Add unit tests for edge cases in damage calculation
Consider extracting damage calculation logic to a separate utility
Implement logging for system damage events
Add more granular difficulty-based damage modifiers
